item.title: Npc help
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

ok, my friend told me to add these code into client.java to stop npc attackers if(server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].attacknpc > 0 || EnemyHP2 == 3000 || EnemyHP2 <= 0) { Cant = true; sendMessage("This Shopkeeper can NOT be attacked thanks to lvl 3 legend"); } and it only stops mage attacking for some shops.

Read full topic
